prompts: Create a majestic bird Pokemon with fiery wings and a fierce expression.
Imagine a legendary Pokemon that embodies the essence of flames and freedom.
Design a powerful fire-type creature known for its vibrant plumage and aerial agility.
Show me a mythical bird Pokemon that soars through the sky, leaving trails of fire.
Generate a Pokemon that combines breathtaking beauty with fierce combat abilities.
Make a legendary fire and flying hybrid that can control the skies with flames.
Give me an image of a majestic Pokemon that symbolizes rebirth through fire.
